about.title: Meet Aya Mohsen
about.description: Licensed English educator specializing in General English, Spoken English, and IELTS preparation. American Diploma holder with IELTS 8.5 score and teaching license from Ain Shams University.

qualifications.title: Qualifications & Certifications
qualifications.subtitle: Academic excellence meets practical teaching experience to deliver exceptional language learning outcomes.

experience.title: Teaching Experience
experience.subtitle: Proven track record of helping students achieve their English learning goals.
experience.successDescription: Students consistently achieve their target band scores
experience.yearsDescription: Extensive experience in online and classroom settings

philosophy.title: My Teaching Philosophy
philosophy.subtitle: Every student is unique, and so should be their learning journey.
philosophy.personalizedDescription: I believe that effective language learning happens when lessons are tailored to individual needs, interests, and learning styles. That's why I take time to understand each student's goals and create customized lesson plans.
philosophy.approach1: Assess individual learning style and pace
philosophy.approach3: Adapt teaching methods to student preferences
philosophy.approach4: Provide regular feedback and progress updates
philosophy.principle1: Build confidence through small, achievable wins
philosophy.principle2: Make learning enjoyable and relevant to real life
philosophy.principle4: Provide consistent support and constructive feedback
philosophy.confidenceDescription: Language learning is a journey that requires patience, practice, and positive reinforcement. I create a supportive environment where students feel comfortable making mistakes and learning from them.
philosophy.ctaDescription: Let's work together to unlock your English potential and achieve your language goals.

testimonials.title: What My Students Say
testimonials.subtitle: Real success stories from students who achieved their English learning goals
testimonials.student1Quote: Aya helped me jump from IELTS 5.5 to 7.5 in just two months! Her teaching methods are incredibly effective.
testimonials.student2Quote: Clear explanations and fun lessons. My speaking confidence soared after just a few sessions with Aya.
testimonials.student3Quote: Finally, I understand phrasal verbs! Aya's structured approach made complex grammar simple.
